definitions.text: a earlier period in someone's life (especially one that they have reason to keep secret)
examples: reporters dug into the candidate's past

definitions.text: a verb tense that expresses actions or states in the past
earlier than the present time; no longer current
of a person who has held and relinquished a position or office
examples: a retiring member of the board

definitions.text: so as to pass a given point
examples: every hour a train goes past
